sentences.sContent: And, with the rise of online education, you can even enroll in certified programs that allow you to learn and improve your career during your off-hours.
sentences.sContent_eng: And, with the rise of online education, you can even enroll in certified programs that allow you to learn and improve your career during your off-hours.
sentences.sCn: 并且，随着在线教育的崛起，你甚至可以参加认证课程，在下班工夫里学习和改善本人的职业生涯。

sentences.sContent: ...They enroll in different kinds of classes...
...typically in a bid to enroll top students in the state’s public institutions...
...Studies show merit aid also tends to benefit disproportionately students who could afford to enroll without it...

synos.tran: 登记；使加入；把...记入名册；使入伍
参加；登记；注册；记入名册

remMethod.val: en(进入) ＋ roll(名单) → 上了名单 → 加入
